title: DELMADE Hydraulic Bale Handler / Hay Unroller

tasks.task: The person is planting potatoes and explanations of a pipe in the ground.
subtasks: Walk to the potato field.
Choose the planting location.
Dig a hole deep enough for the potatoes.
Place the potato to be planted at the bottom of the hole.
Cover the potato with soil, pressing down gently.
Connect the pipe to a water source.
Ensure the pipe is properly inserted into the ground.
Move the pipe along the row as potatoes are planted.

tasks.task: The person is driving a farming machine.
subtasks: Operate the steering wheel to guide the machine.
Use the throttle to control the speed of the machine.
Monitor the equipment for proper function.
Adjust the machine’s height or attachments as needed.
Navigate around obstacles or changes in terrain.
Watch for road signs or other directional changes.

tasks.task: The person is laying on the side of the machine steering wheel.
subtasks: Position the body on the side of the machine.
Keep hands on the steering wheel to maintain control.
Use feet to operate the pedals for accelerator and brakes.
Maintain focus on the direction to avoid derailing.

tasks.task: Fixing a broken part of the pipe.
subtasks: Identify the faulty section of the pipe.
Disconnect the pipe from the water source.
Remove the broken part.
Replace the broken part with a new one.
Reconnect the pipe to the water source.
Test the connection for leaks or proper flow.

tasks.task: The individual is moving the potato furrows.
subtasks: Walk through the potato field.
Notice the furrows made by the machine.
Observe the spacing and depth of the furrows.
Check for any misalignments or inconsistencies.

tasks.task: The person is monitoring the potato plants for signs of infection.
subtasks: Walk through the rows of potato plants.
Inspect each plant for wilted leaves or discoloration.
Note any areas that appear diseased.
Take appropriate measures if infection is detected.

tasks.task: Processing the potatoes at the end of the season.
subtasks: Collect the ripe potatoes from the field.
Sort potatoes by size or quality.
Clean the potatoes by removing dirt or debris.
Store the potatoes in a cool, dry place.
Prepare the harvested potatoes for market or sale.

tasks.task: Checking the ripeness of potatoes using hands.
subtasks: Pick up a potato from the ground.
Feel the texture of the potato.
Compare the texture to determine ripeness.
Remove any unripe potatoes from the field.

tasks.task: The person is driving a tractor.
subtasks: Start the tractor engine.
Adjust the speed and direction using the controls.
Operate the hydraulics to lift or lower attachments.
Check for any mechanical issues while in motion.
Disengage the clutch or shift gears as necessary.

tasks.task: The individual is duplicating water via hose to the pipe.
subtasks: Take the hose from the water source.
Connect the hose to the pipe.
Ensure the hose is properly attached without leaks.
Maintain even pressure while supplying water.
Monitor the flow of water to the pipe.
